RecommendationContent.description: Content to display within each recommendation module

entity.description: Entity being recommended. Empty if the content being recommended is not an entity

params.description: Additional context required to generate the the recommendation

RecommendationParams.description: Parameters required to render a recommendation of a given type

searchParams.description: Context to define the search recommendations

entityProfileParams.description: Context to define the entity profile page

SearchParams.description: Context to define the search recommendations

types.description: Entity types to be searched. If this is not provided, all entities will be searched.

Criterion.description: A criterion for matching a field with given value

field.description: The name of the field that the criterion refers to

value.description: The value of the intended field

values.description:
Values. one of which the intended field should match
Note, if values is set, the above "value" field will be ignored

condition.description: The condition for the criterion, e.g. EQUAL, START_WITH

negated.description: Whether the condition should be negated

Condition.description: The matching condition in a filter criterion

EntityProfileParams.description: Context to define the entity profile page

urn.description: Urn of the entity being shown

count.description: Number of entities corresponding to the recommended content
